name: Fruit Machine (Steve Potts)
overview: A nice, modern 5 reel fruit\slot machine from Steve Potts that will run on even stock Amiga 500's. Has all the extras, nudge, hold and gamble your heart out. Many sites have this title listed as being by Mark Cameron, but it was released as part of a 2 game compilation with Fruit Crush that WAS by Mark Cameron.
